description: Filmed on location in a genuine lifestyle scenario, Domina Hades degrades her slave both verbally and physically after he failed to do some simple house chores. He is made to lick and eat the mud from her shoes, before getting his feed from her heels. He must then lick the sweat from her bare feet, while being spat at and slapped, before being trampled by her full weight and made to drink her fresh piss direct from the source.
title: Hades Humiliates
